# Restaurant Menu and Ordering System - Angular Project

## Project Overview
Restaurant Menu and Ordering System built with Angular 17, TypeScript, and Angular Material.

## Features Implemented
✅ TypeScript models with classes, interfaces, enums, and inheritance
✅ Angular components with data binding and directives (*ngFor, *ngIf, [ngClass], [ngStyle])
✅ Services with dependency injection and RxJS observables
✅ Reactive forms with validation
✅ Angular Material UI components
✅ Routing with parameterized routes
✅ Shopping cart with local storage
✅ Mock JSON data backend

## Components
- navbar - Navigation with cart badge
- menu-list - Grid view with filters
- menu-detail - Detailed item view
- cart - Shopping cart management
- order-form - Checkout with reactive forms

## Running the Project
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start dev server: `npm start` or `ng serve`
3. Open browser: http://localhost:4200
4. Build for production: `npm run build` or `ng build`

## Project Status
✅ All requirements completed
✅ Build successful
